resources.string: 1. Could you tell me your NATIONALITY?
2. In which country have you been living for most of the last 12 months?
Para España preguntar Provincia y localidad. Países lista 1 y 2 área del map
3. You\'ve come to the airport to make a CONNECTION?
"4. From which AIRPORT have you flown to arrive here? "
"5. Which AIRLINE have you flown with? "
6. During the connection, have you had to gather your baggage in this airport and check-in again?
7. During your connection has spent the night in Madrid or around?
9. Where did you start your journey to take this flight in AS Madrid-Barajas´s airport?
Especificar Distrito o en su defecto calle y nº, hotel o similar
10. In what kind of accommodation have you been in your stay in %1$s?
11. How many modes of transport has used for the airport?
"12. ¿Could you tell me the mode of transport used for the airport? "
12b. Could you tell me the first and the last the modes of transport that you took to arrive to the airport?
The driver comes to DROP SOMEONE OFF
14. Where have you left your vehicle?
AREA UP / DOWN passenger/Parking Express (15’ free)
"At the airport’s PAYMENT PARKING of AENA (during the trip) "
"At the airport’s PAYMENT PARKING of AENA (while saying good bye to my accompanying person) "
In a PAYMENT PARKING No AENA outside the airport.
16. Did you have to use the shuttle between terminals today?
15. How many people (friends, family, colleagues, etc.) came to say goodbye to you and entered into the terminal building?
17. At what time did you reach the airport?\t
"18. Which airport are you traveling to on the flight you are boarding now? "
20. Are you traveling to the destination airport %1$s simply to transfer or does your air journey finish there?
"20a Which airline are you following your flight with? "
21. At which airport will you complete your air journey
"22. What is the MAIN PURPOSE of your journey? "
23. Is this your OUTWARD or RETURN journey?
"23a How long will you be away? "
"23b How long have you been away? "
24. Including yourself, how many people are TRAVELING in your immediate group?
26. Could you please tell me your relationship with the members of this trip?
27 How long did you book your ticket ago?
"28. What tariff is the ticket you are going to use? "
"29. How often have you flown over the last 12 MONTHS without considering this one? "
29. How often have you made the whole same trip over the last 12 MONTHS without considering this one?
30. How the COVID-19 pandemic has affected your choice to travel by plane: (Check the option that best suits your choice)
I will only take a flight if absolutely necessary.
It is unlikely to travel to pre-pandemic levels.
I will return to air travel at a similar pre-pandemic level.
The restrictions have not affected my choice to travel
30. Have you checked in your luggage?
"31. How many people do these cases belong to? "
"32. ¿At which check-in desk has you left your luggage? "
In automatic Drop off desk (withou airline personel)\t
33. Where did you obtain your boarding pass?
34. Have you consumed today anything in the airport restaurants services?
"34a. Approximately how much have you spent today in the catering services at the airport? "
"35. Have you bought today anything in the airport shops? "
"35a. How much have you spent in the airport shops? "
35b. Could you please state what kind of products you have purchased?
36. Which of the following work situations are you currently in?
Fixed salary employee in public sector
Fixed salary employee in private sector
39. Which of these age groups do you belong to?
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR HELP
41. How likely are you to recommend the experience at this airport to a colleague or friend? (valore del 0 al 10, donde 0 es nada probable y 10 es extremadamente probable)
